mdRecord.dcterms:title: Personal Family Correspondence about the Birth of Mattie Stigleman, 1863
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Personal family correspondence to “My dear Mattie,” 3rd child of Dr. and Mrs. C. M. Stigleman born 1863. Correspondence dated December 19, 1883, 3 photocopied pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
